title: ‘Quick Hits’ With Malcolm Jenkins (Ep. 95)
description:
The Ringer's Kevin Clark and Philadelphia Eagle Malcolm Jenkins discuss Jenkins's efforts for social justice (00:25), activism in the NFL (03:00), Donald Trump (12:00), the timing of Colin Kaepernick's protest (16:00), and Chip Kelly's future in football (29:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
